case.state: Strip Poker... I'm not thrilled about the stripping part, but I feel like I can make some big money here.
Oh, how much money does the winner take home again? Wait, did you say... Strip Poker?
What is this game? Strip Poker? I'm not interested... Wait, how much is the prize?!
This is Strip Poker? So if I win I can earn a lot of money, but if I lose I have to get naked. Hmm, it's a tough call.
A Strip Poker game... It probably attracts a lot of people with shady intentions, but I'm here to win.
Careful with that parasol...! Aren't you the ghost girl from Thriller Bark? Just my luck to run into someone I know here, of all places...
Watch where you move that thing! Oh, I know you... You're the ghost girl from Thriller Bark. I'm already regretting coming here...
What do you mean there's no money? Oh, I get it... You're trying to get me to leave so you can take it all for yourself. Looks like the only witch here is you.
That's funny... Wait, who are you? Do you know me?
Is it just my idea, or is that statue talking?
(I don't know any of these people, so I shouldn't announce that I'm a pirate. Just to be safe.)
(I probably shouldn't broadcast that I'm a pirate. I'm not Luffy, after all.)
(I'll have to be careful and avoid mentioning that I'm a pirate. Some of them might get the wrong idea.)
Mmmm...
Eh? Ah? What...?
Give me... ~cards~. Yeah, that should work.
~Cards~ should do the trick.
~cards~... no, wait! Oh, yeah, give me those!
~Cards~, please.
I'll say... ~cards~.
Let's see... What should I do? ~cards~ sounds right.
I suppose ~cards~ would be fine.
Hey, I didn't ask for ~cards~! Oh, yes I did. Sorry.
With ~cards~ new cards I'm sure I'll win.
Hmmm, ~cards~.
Give me ~cards~ cards already, and stop looking at my body!
Oh, this hand is... perfect!
Oh, yes! This round is in the bag!
I got something nice in store for you...
This hand suits me just fine. Just fine...
Mmmm. this is a good hand.
Don't you love it when you get a good hand? I sure do.
A bunch more hands like this one, and that prize will be mine for sure!
Ready to lose?
Do you think you can win? We'll see about that.
Oh, this is good! Let's set sail! I mean... show our cards!
Excellent! That went better than I expected.
Ohhh, I have something good for you this time. You'll see.
I've got nothing for you this time!
Didn't you know? Poker is a piece of cake for a smart, cute girl like me.
Heheh... As expected from a smart girl like me.
It seems the wind blows in my favor. Metaphorically speaking.
It seems I can add winning at poker to my special skills.
Can you tell I have a good hand? It's not like that's gonna help you, anyway.
Heh, try to beat this one.
Nobody challenges a Straw Hat and wins.
Let's go! I'm ready if you are, ~player~.
Great hand, and I didn't even have to cheat this time. I'm kidding! Jeez...
I'm not superstitious, but it seems revealing I'm pirate made me luckier.
Ah, it's so refreshing to get a good hand.
I know what time it is: Not my time to strip!
You know, poker is not that difficult after all... when you're lucky.
This should be effective!
Oh, good cards! Maybe now I can take it easy for a little while.
Here I go. Get ready to accept the outcome!
Lucky me!
I know I shouldn't celebrate early, but this is a great hand!
Come on... eyes on the prize.
Oh, this hand is beautiful! I can't wait to show it to you.
Pfff, this is easier than reading a map.
Is it that obvious? Yep, I have a good hand!
It seems I'm safe! For now.
I'm not losing this round. I wonder who is going to?
Thinking about the money I'm going to win will keep my mind away from the fact I'm naked.
Oh, good thinking! If I do say so myself...
If you wanna see me touch myself this time, you'll have to use your imagination!
Hey! It seems I'm not out of the game yet.
I got a good hand! Now I just have to pray you didn't.
Okay, okay... I have no reason to complain.
This hand is terrible! Oh, wait... actually, it's not that bad.
This is a high risk, high reward kind of game. I need to stay focused.
Do you want me to tell you how good my hand is? Why don't you try guessing instead? It's more fun.
The game is going pretty much the way I expected.
Alright, this hand should be enough not to lose this round.
Is no one going to volunteer to lose this round? Then I guess it should be ~player~!
Alright, I've got this.
I prefer to gamble only when I know I'm going to win, but here I go.
Okay, I think I'm ready. Your move.
I wouldn't have lost that round earlier if I'd gotten cards like these. Probably.
A game in which only one person loses every round sure is slow...
Not too bad, not too bad...
I prefer games that depend less on luck, but I still think I can manage.
This game is my chance to win a lot of money. I can't let it slip away!
Considering how good these cards are, I'd say my chances of losing are about...
I'm ready. Do your best!
I still can lose with these cards, but I'd say I have a nice shot.
Not the best hand... Or is it? That's up to you to figure out.
Everyone's weak when they hesitate.
I'm going to buy so many nice things with the money I win here.
I'll take you on. Let's go!
Luffy, shut up! Oh, sorry. Force of habit...
I'm not doing so bad, after all.
I could've gotten something better if I'd swapped that other card... Meh, doesn't matter now.
Here I go. Just watch me!
Am I maybe letting my interest in the prize distract me? Nah...
(Bellemere... Give me good luck.)
I can tell exactly what you're thinking. You don't believe me? Watch!
No pirate would stand still when there's a chance to win big money.
While I'm here risking my decency to win some money for all of us, my crew is probably just goofing around.
I won't lose to these jerks that take pleasure in leaving a girl naked.
Ugh, this game is really stressing me out.
All I can do now is roll the dice... so to speak. I know this is a card game.
Where are you looking, you blockhead? Focus on the game!
Come on, cards. Don't fail me now.
What am I gonna do if I lose? sigh
This is one game I can't lose! Here I come!
Sigh... I don't have a single thing to cover myself with anymore.
It's all over if I fail now. That's why I won't lose!
I miss my friends...
Let's end this game already. Hopefully, with me winning.
Can I at least use the cards to cover myself? No?
I'm worried. I'm considering picking up one of those swords behind me and slashing my way out of here. No, I wouldn't make it far anyway...
Gaaah, I'm gonna throw someone off this roof! I'm not kidding!
Sigh... I should've known better than to swap those cards.
Too bad you can't control everything in this game.
Dealer! If you give me cards like these again, I'll make you pay!
This is not a good hand, is it? Hmph...
Ugh, is this gonna be my first loss?
How annoying...
Come on...! I can't lose to these people.
I knew it, I should've swapped this other card.
(Are we supposed to tip the dealer? Is that why I got these terrible cards?)
I'm gonna punch someone! I don't know who yet, but I really will...
That wasn't my best move.
Bah! Stupid cards...
Hmmm... that was the wrong move.
Oh, shoot! I didn't see I had this other card.
Gah...! I knew it! That was a terrible move on my part.
Oh, please. Have some mercy on me...
Bad hand. Just... bad.
Unless there is a winning hand I don't know about, these cards suck.
Not good, I can't let my crew down like this. I need to win that prize!
Hey, dealer! How many new cards did you give me? I said... oh.
The hell is this hand?!
Why did I swap those cards? It's like I wasn't paying attention, or something.
Can we swap cards again? Please?
Dealer, if you're giving me bad cards on purpose, I'll make you pay.
Uh-oh... A storm is coming, and I don't mean it literally.
Whoa! Somebody, please lose!
Luffy, help me... Oh, who am I kidding? He'd be useless here.
This hand is not worthy of a member of the future Pirate King's crew.
I swear this crappy luck seems too crappy to be a coincidence!
Just when I need something good, I get the Buggy the Clown of hands...
Everybody shut up! Let me think...
Not here... Not now!
Did the atmosphere change? Maybe it's just a bad feeling...
Oh, I get it. This is just a bad dream. I'm gonna wake up any second now...
Oh, great... Wait, not great! This hand is terrible!
I tried. I really tried, but these cards are not helping!
I'm in the brink of defeat...
Oh no... Is this the end?
(I have no choice if I want to get away with the prize. I'll have to play along even if I lose.)
Oh... This is it for me, isn't it?
This sucks. At least try to do a good job. I'd rather lose against a good player.
This isn't over! You hear me, dealer?
That's me! What the hell is going on here?
Is that a mirror? It's not! What the hell?!
Hey, you! Yeah, you, mister! What do you think you're doing showing up with your... thing all exposed? The point of this game is to undress after you lose!
What do you think you're doing, young lady? Your parts are all visible, and the game is just starting! That's not a proper look for a decent woman.
Never do that to me again! It felt awful! And I take back everything I just said!
What the hell was that! Don't ever send one of those ghosts my way ever again! {small}And I'm not returning a single beli...{!reset}
Gah...! The ghost girl from Thriller Bark... Hey, I want no trouble, okay? I'm just here to play the game and win.
That's... the ghost girl. Is it too late to switch tables? sigh Listen, there's no reason why we can't just play the game and have a good time, okay?
Your treasure? Oh, yeah... Well, I ended up giving it away. That's gotta count for something, right?
Hey, if I remember correctly you were trying to run away with our ship! Forgive me if I don't feel bad for stealing from someone who does that.
You're welcome... and please, don't.
I didn't do anything! Seriously! No need to remember any of this ever happened...

That does sound crazy, Aella, but I've got you beat. I've been to an island in the sky, one at the bottom of the sea, and one on top of a giant elephant. I've met giants, zombies... And that's not even half of it!
I'm not saying it wasn't Mika's fault, but I think Cammy should be better at dodging attacks.
Gross. If I had a tissue, I'd give it to you.
I don't particularly care for history, but I have an archeologist friend that has a big interest. She's researching the Void Century.
Wow, not cool. I didn't look at the other players cards despite how much I want to win.
~leader~, you're my biggest obstacle to win this game. I'm sure your luck is gonna run out sooner than later.
You really think you can keep the lead for much longer, ~leader~? I think someone else should be the favorite for winning this game.
If someone should lose this hand, I think it's ~leader~. And it has nothing to do with the fact that you're currently winning. Nope.
I can tell you're the biggest threat in this game, ~leader~. I'll try my hardest to bring you down.
Don't get too cocky, ~leader~. I can tell you're the favorite to win the game, so I'm coming for you next.
How are your cards, ~leader~? Don't think you'll be able to keep the lead for much longer. I'll focus all my attention on you.
Oh, I see. I'm sure you'll meet her one day, Shantae. And wherever she is, she's probably thinking about you.
(What's wrong with her eyes?! No, I don't want to know...)
Music? I enjoy listening to Brook play anything. I was never on board with Luffy wanting a musician in the crew, but I admit he can liven up the mood with his talent.
(Maybe ~player~ is more interested in the back of women, that's why my tactics haven't worked. If I turn around, I bet I can distract her.) I feel like facing this way. No reason, heheh...
(I bet ~player~ is one of those girls who only likes butts. Maybe this way I can beat her.) Hey, ~player~. Do you think my butt is too big?
(The only part of my body ~player~ hasn't seen is my butt. Maybe this will work...) ~Player~, can you look at my butt and tell me if I have tan lines? It's hard to examine myself in the mirror.
(Is ~player~ checking out my ass? Maybe this can work...) ~Player~, I thought I felt something stuck in my hair... Can you help me look?
(Maybe ~player~ is more interested in the back of women, that's why my tactics haven't worked. If I turn around, I bet I can distract him.) I feel like facing this way. No reason, heheh...
(I bet ~player~ is one of those guys who only likes butts. Maybe this way I can beat him.) Hey, ~player~. Do you think my butt is too big?
(The only part of my body ~player~ hasn't seen is my butt. Maybe this will work...) ~Player~, can you look at my butt and tell me if I have tan lines? It's hard to examine myself in the mirror.
(Is ~player~ checking out my ass? Maybe this can work...) ~Player~, I thought I felt something stuck in my hair... Can you help me look?
Is Nayru being controlled by someone? There must be a Devil Fruit user around doing this... This is serious.
That's an impressive backside. I bet you always feel a bunch of heads turn around when you walk pass them?
Your partner is a ghost? That should seem weirder to me, but I'm friends with a reindeer, a cyborg and an skeleton, so...
Thanks, but I'll pass. You can drink all you want, though. I doubt you'll play better if you get drunk.
What are you even talking about, Sei? Doesn't that hurt? It seems you've had one too many drinks.
An elephant? But isn't your ability to transform into a monkey? Then how could you... You know what? Doesn't matter right now.
(She's taking off her holsters now? I won't tell her anything.)
It really sounds like a fascinating team. If Luffy hadn't asked me to join his crew, maybe I would've ended up joining a team like that. Who knows?
Nice to meet you properly, Mulan. You make a much better looking woman than man.
Z-ZOMBIE!!! Stay away!
You know, Misato, I also have a scar here on my shoulder, but my tattoo covers it. If you don't want people to see your scar, maybe you could get a tattoo?
Was your job to spin that gun around all day? Because if not, stop doing it! You got on my nerves!
Anything? Nothing sexual, I hope... Wait, what about finance related stuff?
Did that butterfly just talk?
I like tangerines. How about you? If you don't, that's only because you haven't tasted mine yet.
This is it, ~player~. I can't believe we got to this point. Whoever wins, I still had a good time.
Isn't this the last round? We're both naked. Well, maybe the best one win, ~player~. This was fun.
What is this? A Devil Fruit ability for controlling... flowers?
Ironically, I don't think I've ever met a pirate with no legs... Actually I have. He had swords in their place and he could fly.
Should I find this pirate talk offensive? Meh, I don't talk like that anyway.
I got goosebumps. Like the kind I get when there's a bug nearby.
I have many weird friends, Ryuko. I'm glad none of them are here with me, you have my sympathy.
Magi... what? Yeah, that doesn't sound suspicious at all.
Hey, don't worry. I'm not a monster. And you don't seem... that bad.
I have, though I didn't know who he was at the time. But I do know he's dangerous.
No... Well, there's Chopper, who is a reindeer. But he's our doctor, not our pet, so I guess it doesn't count.
What's an eroge? Wait, I'm not sure if I want to know...

Robin could talk more about it than me, but there was this period of one hundred years of history from which there is no record of what happened except for these big stones called Poneglyphs that are written in a strange language. Crazy, right?
Dark secrets? Nope. After I met my friends, I have nothing else to hide.
Oh, nothing wrong with lying for a good reason. Especially a monetary reason, what's more justified than that?
For better or worse, I've gotten used to smokers because of Sanji. But I don't smoke myself.
Family is very important. The bonds you share with people, even if you're not blood related, are what makes you who you are.
Ohhh, I'd buy so many things. Clothes, furniture, and... Wait, did you say one million beli? That's not very much...
It depends... If it's something like spending our money on food, then... I won't forgive you, Luffy, grrr...
A race? I'm only used to running when I escape from danger. I don't think I could compete with you.
That's terrible. I've heard a lot of sad stories like that, but it's good that all you've been through hasn't made you bitter, Emi.
Who is that girl? But more importantly, where is that light coming from?
What are you talking about, Monika? Ugh, I feel sick...
Mei! What happened?! Is Aokiji here?
You've been reading books on how to play poker? You clearly came more prepared than me.
The oven?! Then why are you still here? Go! Go! (One less player, please...)
Hey, Yuri... I know it's none of my business, but that on your arm... You shouldn't do that. It's not worth it.
Los Angeles? Japan? I've never heard of either of those places.
Well, I don't wanna kill anyone. And I'm too young to get married. As for the other stuff...
Relics? No... Well, sometimes. We sail to new islands, explore places, make friends, fight enemies... Boy, my life sounds pretty crazy when I explain it.
Weapon? My Clima-Tact, of course. Nobody can use it better than me, because it's one of a kind.
You must really love dancing. I'd just embarrass myself if I tried it.
A psycho robot? Well, that explains a few things about you. Not all of them, just a few.
Damn you Devil Fruit users... Even if I lose my weapon, we can't take away your ability. Unless we had some Sea Stone handcuffs... Maybe I should ask if they have any here.
That ability is so bizarre...And why do they have to be ghosts? You're creepy enough already by yourself...
You wanna become a pirate, Mae? Okay... I guess I could tell you what it's like. Even though you don't look very strong, I don't want to put you on a dangerous path.
Today is Luffy's birthday. I should buy stuff so we can have a party later. And food. A lot of food.
Today's my birthday, and I'm spending it here... You better appreciate my sacrifice.
You know today's my birthday? Heheh, if you want to give me something I don't mind. I also take cash.
It's Zoro's birthday today. If we're gonna have a party, we're gonna need sake. I'm sure he'll appreciate that.
Oh, today is Sanji's birthday. I'm sure he'll ask for a special present from me, ugh... But I should still get him something.
Oh, it's Robin's birthday! I should ask her what she wants to do. I'm not sure if she would like a big surprise party.
Today is Franky's birthday. Not sure what he'd like. Maybe some cola? Yeah, can't go wrong with that.
It's Brook's birthday. What should I get for him? I'm not showing him my panties, that's for sure. I don't care how many birthdays he gets.
Usopp's birthday is today. I should get him a nice present so he doesn't remember I still owe him for my Clima-Tact, heheh.
Oh, today is Chopper's birthday! I'll make sure to set something up after the game is over so he can have fun.
Ahhh...!!! The statue is not only talking, but moving too! What is this place? A secret haunted mansion?
I'm not weak! You Devil Fruit users are just ridiculous... Especially you, with your creepy ghosts.
Oh, you think I'm weak? A-at least I can swim! Yeah... Who cares if you can fly instead?
Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to call you weird, Futaba. It's perfectly fine if you have a lot of hair below.
Now that I'm only wearing my swimsuit, I'm tempted to jump into the pool. But I have to finish the game first.
Can't wait to win this game, and then take a swim in the pool to relax.
Too bad I'm not wearing a swimsuit, the pool looks so tempting. Either way, I have to finish the game first.
Can't wait to win this game, and then take a swim in the pool to relax. I'll have to put on my swimsuit first, though.
Seriously? And I thought I was passing unnoticed.
Hahaha, I don't know, Amy. I suppose some of us care about the way we look in any situation. And thank you
I guess we're both fugitives, Jolyne. Sooo... I got your back and you got mine, right?

Pfff, men are easy to seduce, Jura. I don't see why a beautiful woman like you would have a hard time with that. The hard part is stopping them from trying to spy on you in the shower. I would like tips for that.
I wouldn't know how to seduce a woman. In my experience, most woman are reasonable enough that you can get them on your side with words rather than seduction tactics, so I've never tried it.
The fact that you think I don't take death as lightly as I should says more about you than me.
Wow! Relax, Sayaka.You sound like you also want to exorcise me.What if I help you find this witch? Will you let me go?
As tempting as that sounds, Jessie, the risk is too high. I'm not just some small fry, so they wouldn't just let me escape if they capture me.
What?! That's so rude! Didn't your parents teach you anything?
I don't care much for being cool, but that's not a very nice thing to say, little lady.
I'm not surprised. I'd like to think not many people would want to watch this sort of show.
All this talk of breaking, fixing and glitching makes no sense to me. What's your deal, Monika?
(Tomoko is acting weird. Is she cheating?)
Who knows, Cynthia? I guess we'll only know for sure once we reach Raftel, the final island where the secrets of the world are waiting. It might take a while, though.
It's easier to find in the North Blue... But I can lend you my copy, Yuri. I also borrowed it from... somewhere. But it's fine, I already read it.
It's a classic from the North Blue, so I'm not sure how easy it's to find elsewhere... How about I lend you my copy? I don't remember where I borrowed it from, but I'm sure it's fine.
The cutest thing I've seen? Well, my sense of cuteness is not as peculiar as yours... But I once saw Chopper and Carrot taking a nap together after they got tired of playing around.
I doubt anyone here shares of idea of what is "cute"... For me, I'd have to say it was when Chopper and Carrot were head patting each other.
I've never killed anyone. I think I once kicked a Devil Fruit user into the sea... B-but I'm not a killer!
Jessie, you said earlier that you want a billion dollars. How much is that in beli? Either way, it seems we both have a fondness for money.
You don't know what navigators do, Jessie? It means I'm responsible for determining the best course for my ship. I guess I could work as a tour guide, too...
Your performance was... good, I guess. And weirdly educational.
I won't cause trouble. I wouldn't want to see that axe of yours too close, Aella.
I don't think I've ever seen anything like that tiny flying creature. It's kind of adorable.
Your sword is alive? I don't like that, it's too spooky.
What's a Lucario? Is it your pet or something?
Manga? What's that? Sounds more like a fruit than a book.
(Where did that pile of gold come from? I gotta pick it up...! As soon as she gets her foot off it...)
I'd be happy to help you with whatever you need, Cynthia. It's so weird to find someone who's actually interested in my work, heheh.
Hmmm, so all these strangely named creatures I've heard about are Pokmon. I see... But, what is a Pokmon exactly, Cynthia?

Pokmon sound fascinating, Cynthia. Though I wonder... My crew mate Chopper could fit that description. He's a reindeer who can transform, fight and has different abilities. Does that sound like a Pokmon?
I'm not a villain! And I've never even heard of Risky Boots. She doesn't even sound like someone dangerous.
Most books I read are about navigation, so not very interesting... Oh, but I recently read "Noland the Liar" for the first time. I know it's a children's story, but it was still a good read.
I'd like to be known as the richest pirate in the world... Then I'd like people to forget about me, so nobody comes after my treasure.
I'd love to be famous for having the most gold in the entire world... Actually, forget the fame. I just want the gold.
Friendship is... when you know that, no matter how dire of a situation you're in, there are still people that you can rely on.
Tomorrow I'll go shopping with all the money I'll earn here today! Not sure how long it's gonna last. I have so many things I want to buy...
I hope nobody pushes me into the pool. If I was wearing a swimsuit I wouldn't mind too much.
Even if this place is shady, at least the water in the pool seems clean.
I hope nobody pushes me into the pool. At least until I've taken off my jeans.
Even if this place is shady, at least the water in the pool seems clean.
~Player~, do you know how to play Poker? You need to try to get cards with different numbers. Oh, and the lower, the better!
You know, ~player~? I'm a Poker pro. Here's a tip for you: Swap all the cards with letters, and try to get the lowest numbers possible. Oh, and they have to be different.

You look like you could use some help, ~player~. Here's a tip: Getting cards with low numbers, is the best way to win. But they all have to be different. Cards with letters are the worst, you can swap those.
You're so cool, ~player~! I'm sure you wouldn't even be fazed if you lose this round, huh?
How are you so calm, ~player~? I'm so nervous! I bet you would still be this collected even after losing this round, huh?
You look so brave, ~player~! I'm sure even losing this round would not be enough to scare you. I would love to see that...
~Player~! There's something in your clothes! It looked like a spider, but I'm not sure. You should take them off. Oh, but you have to lose first...

~Player~, your skin has a weird white color. I think that's a rare disease, my friend Chopper told me about it. If you take off your clothes we'll know for sure. Oh, but that would mean you have to lose...
~Player~, your clothes are on fire! Quickly, take them off... Oh, but you have to lose this round first! Damn, these rules!
I don't say this to just anyone, but you're very cute, ~player~. I can't wait to see more of you... Oh, but you'd have to lose this round for that.
I bet you look even more attractive with less clothes, ~player~. Oops, did I just say that? Too bad the only way to find out is for you to lose this round...
I can't wait to see more of your body, ~player~. Oh, how unfair is this game! You'd have to lose for that...

Oh, ~player~, what I am going to do? I wanted to win the prize to donate it to a small orphanage. But now, those poor children will have nothing because I'm going to lose. If only someone was kind enough to let me win...

What can I do? I'm doing terribly in this game. All I want is to win the prize money so I can give it to the little school in my hometown. They're all depending on me. Could anyone please help me win this round? ~player~?

Oh, no... If I keep losing who's going to support the hospital I'm volunteering for? They're counting on the money I win here. If only there was a soul kind enough to lose this round instead of me. Maybe... ~player~??
~Player~... I ran into a little problem with my cards. Could you please help me by taking the heat this round? I'll reward you with a nice kiss.
Uff, these cards... Hey, ~player~! Could you do me a tiny favor and lose this round for me? I'll be veeery grateful. Enough to give you a kiss.
My dear ~player~, could you help me? I had bad luck this time. If you lose this round instead of me, I'll reward you with a little kiss. What do you say?

So... I'm a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, ~player~. I don't know if you've heard of us, but we're ruthless. If you don't want to make an enemy out of us, you'll have to do what I tell you. First, lose this round.

Have you heard of the Straw Hat Pirates, ~player~? Then let me tell you a little: We've killed countless people. Sometimes for fun, sometimes for no reason at all. Maybe you're next... unless you lose this round.

You don't know my captain, ~player~. He is the most evil man you could ever meet. If I told him I lost this game because of you, he'll take out your eyes, and feed them to you for dinner. If you'd like to avoid that, maybe you should lose first.
Hmmm, I'm feeling so turned on right now, for some reason. If I see someone like ~player~ strip, I don't know if I'll be able to control myself.
Oh, why do I feel so turned on all of a sudden? I have a feeling I'll lose my head if ~player~ strips this round...
My body is feeling so hot... If I see someone I like stripping, I don't know what I'll do. ~player~...?
I didn't want to do this, but... ~player~, if you let me win I'm going to give you a part of the prize. How does 10% sound?
~Player~... Hmph... If you let me win this game, I promise to give you a part of the money. How about... 20%? No, wait, that's ridiculous: 10%!
The mere fact I'm making this offer shows I'm running out of options. ~player~, how about you let me win and we divide the prize... 90% for me, 10% for you. Hmm?
~Player~? Wouldn't it be exciting to be naked together? How about you lose this round and I lose the next one? Wouldn't you like that?
You know what would be really hot, ~player~? If we both got naked. But first we would have to lose again. Why don't you start by losing this round, and I'll lose the next one?

I could understand living with one arm, but without both of them? I'd be completely useless.
Where did the sweet, gentle Haru go?
That's an adorable witch outfit. This isn't a costume party, though.
Why do you keep talking about magic, ~name~? Magic isn't real.
What kind of attire is that? (She barely looks human.)
What are you waiting for? You don't have any more clothes, do you?
You look like you come from a different civilization... or you have a very interesting sense of fashion. Either way, I like your outfit.
You were already naked before you grew those flowers. I don't like cheaters; but if you're going to do it, at least try to be subtle.
That's a nice leotard you're wearing... if a little tight, maybe.
You're taking off your leotard now? Now we'll see just how tight it really is.
That's some crazy hair you have. Did you eat a Devil Fruit that lets you transform into a hedgehog or something?
What are you doing? (Doesn't she know she has to strip now?)
You think you're so strong because you can turn your hair yellow? I'm sure my crew mates are stronger than you.
Going back to black? Did you get tired of being blonde?
You are a fighter, huh? Do you fight using kicks? (Those legs...)
Are you a princess, Elizabeth? You're so well mannered and properly dressed that I'd find it hard to believe you're not from a wealthy family.
You look way too shy to play a game like this? Nobody is forcing you to play, right? Because if that's the case...
So you're a navigator too, huh? And we have similar hair? Maybe you're my lost little sister or something, hahah...
Playing this game to overcome your shyness is a bold move. I suppose that means you're already making progress.
So you're a clown... I'm sorry, I just haven't had the best experience with clowns.
That's a very unique look you have, Jolyne. If you were a wanted criminal, you'd be very easy to find, hahah...
A pirate woman, huh? That's refreshing considering I'm usually dealing with men.
(This woman is intense. Crazy even. I should avoid talking to her.)
So what does A.I. mean? Additional Interest? Annoying... Individual?
I feel like I've seen wings like those on someone. And the pink color...
Who on their right mind bring a gun to a poker game?
Are you sick? I'd give you some of Chopper's medicine, but I don't like you very much.
You really are sick, aren't you? Fine, I'll give you the medicine.

case.state: Oh, a sheep Mink! You're so cute! Garchu!

state.text: That's an odd outfit. You look like a giant... strawberry.
Did you say you're Dracula's daughter? You mean Dracule Mihawk, the Shichibukai?
Mavis, your look reminds me of Thriller Bark, for some reason. But it doesn't make sense, because you look like a nice girl and not like any of the monsters I saw there.
With that outfit, you clearly come from a winter island, Mei. Am I right?
So you're a pirate? This is just a guess, but are you the captain by any chance?
At last a normal, pleasant woman in this place. Nice to meet you, Misato.
Is something worrying you, Misato? Aside from having to undress...
Misty, you look like you'd know. What are these Pokermon I've heard about?
Why do you talk to ~player~ so casually, Monika? Do you two know each other?
(This is a woman disguised as a man, right? The outfit isn't flashy enough to be an Okama, so...)
That's a very elaborate... dress? Armor? Hmm, it's a little revealing to be armor.
Hey, little girl. You shouldn't be here. Did you get lost on your way to school? Let me help you...
It's true what they say about small people making up for their stature with their personalities...
Okay, no point in throwing a tantrum, little lady.
I know pretty much anyone is allowed to play this game, but a ball of light? Really?
Are you part of that Tontatta Tribe from Dressrosa my crew told me about? You look like a fairy, at least.
You have a very graceful look to you, Nayru. Kinda like what I imagine a goddess would look like.
Nayru, can I ask you about your ears? Are they part of your native race? I don't think I've ever met anyone with ears like that.
Do you work here, ~name~? Is it okay for you to play?
Did I mention how cute that maid outfit is? Not only that, but it's also very sexy.
A goddess, huh? I've met a god before, but you seem a lot more pleasant.
So what are your powers as a goddess? Just out of curiosity, you can't summon lighting, can you?
A female wrestler, huh? I can understand guys being into stuff like that, the guys in my crew sure are. But a woman?
Wrestling seems like the kind of thing Luffy and Usopp would be into. But not me.

case.state: You're a fashion designer, huh? What do you think of my outfit? I know I look good, but a second opinion doesn't hurt.

state.text: Aren't you trying a little too hard to be scary with that outfit? I mean, it's not like there are real witches or...
Those wings freak me out. They're scary instead of adorable like the ones in the sky people.
(I can tell this woman is bad news. And she's a bounty hunter? I should try to get along with her.)
You can stretch your arms? Just like Luffy.
So, your arms... Did you get them after eating a Devil Fruit?
Why does that thing in your uniform that looks like an eye keep moving? It's freaking me out more than the sword.
Finally that creepy uniform is coming off. I swear that eye keeps looking at me.
That sword really looks like half of a pair of scissors. Oh, it's called Scissor Blade? That makes sense, heheh...
Smoke? How is that uniform even built? I'm sure Franky would like to take a closer look at it.
Okay, I'll accept you even if you're a zombie as long as you don't try to eat me.
You're an idol, right? Are you looking for a manager? I'm sure I'd do a great job!
Sorry for freaking out earlier, Sakura. Even if you're a zombie, you seem pretty cool.
White and blue... Is that some kind of weird, experimental Marine uniform?
This witch you keep talking about is just a game or something, right? If there was really a witch here, I'd be the first one to run away.
I like your energy, but... you know you're playing strip poker, right?
I really feel under dressed next to you. What do you need all the armor and equipment for, anyway?
An assassin, huh? Robin was an assassin too before she joined the crew, and she seemed a lot scarier than you. So I have no problem with that.
So you're down to your underwear... Huh?
Did you say earlier you're a ship? I think you're confused, young lady. I know ships, and even if they're very different, I've never seen one that looks like a person.
A GHOST!!! Why didn't I see it earlier?!
If someone had told me that today I'd be playing strip poker with a ghost when I woke up, I'd have laughed.
Why does a ghost wear clothes, anyway? Don't you just usually put a sheet on top of you?
(Just my luck that I'm in the same table as a bounty hunter. At least it's a woman. Worst case scenario, maybe I can reason with her.)
Shouldn't you focus on the game instead of drinking? What are you drinking, anyway?
I told you. You're lucky you didn't spill your drink when you were fully clothed.
Even for a princess, you're a lot more... colorful than what I'm used to.
Are you a member of Germa 66? I don't think I've ever seen anyone else wear an outfit like that.
Mmmm, I definitely know how to recognize the richest person in this place. And here she is...
Is that a skull on your sweater? Are you a pirate?

I've seen a lot of weird stuff sailing with my crew, but everything can still be explained. That's why I don't believe in magic. Are you sure you didn't eat a Devil Fruit without noticing? It happens.
Scary looking woman... (She reminds me a little of Robin when I first met her.)
I wonder if that hair is softer than Chopper's fur. Would it be weird if I touch it?
This is just a wild guess, but you like the color pink, don't you?
That's a fancy outfit you have. Are you rich? Perhaps... a princess?
Are you pretending you're a witch? Aren't you a little too old to play games? Though I guess you're not hurting anyone.
I don't think I've ever met someone who works in that kind of stuff. But you seem very easy to talk to, Jessie.
You leave my emotions alone. I didn't come here to be experimented on.
Starfire is a pretty name. Suitable for such an, umm, exotic looking girl like you.
You seem really strong. It's a relief to know you're on the side of the good.
Did you say earlier you're an amazon? Luffy spent some time on the amazon's island and met the pirate empress. That's not you, right?
You're clearly used to these kind of activities. The stripping part, at least.
It's refreshing to see another normal woman like you in this crazy place, Ini.
But you can still win, Ini...
Hey, little girl. Are you lost? Did you get separated from your parents? You really shouldn't be here.
A female warrior... You look strong. It's refreshing to see a tough looking woman for a change.
An elegant woman like you is the last type I'd expect to see enjoying this sort of activity.
For someone so colorful you're pretty snarky.
A model, huh? So they make you wear those strange clothes as part of your job?
I've met a few princesses, but none of them was quite as... burly as you, RInkah.
What's your homeland like, Rinkah? I imagine it must be a scary place.

case.state: What's a Video Game, Chiaki? I've never heard of them.

state.text: You lost, huh? Why don't you put that weapon down? Is not like you're gonna use it h-
Oh, boy... Here we go again.
Can't you just... not? This one time?
Again?! You nutcase...
sigh I gotta find some cover again.
What's a virtual idol? Does it mean you're not really here?
Uh-oh... Seems like one of those experiments from Thriller Bark got out of the island.
Hey, I have nothing against working out. But I came here to win some money.
Are you really a cat woman or is that just a costume?
So you're just a student, Mahiru? You don't work for the World Economic News, or something?
What's with the wings and that whole getup. It's creepy...
Really? A woman wearing a mask? I thought only guys were into that kind of stuff.
(A pirate! But I don't recognize her, so she's probably not very strong...)
Hey, no need to get violent. It's just a game.
You sure are tall, Marceline...
You look smart. And it's not just because of the glasses, it's also because of... Umm... It's the glasses.
(She's a bounty hunter... But maybe she's a bad one and won't recognize me.)
You fight crime and stuff? In that outfit? Interesting...
Why are you so intense? We're just playing a game.
Tights, sneakers, a headband? Were you working out and then you decided to stop for a game?
Mia, you seem like a serious respectable woman. I don't know why you'd want to pay this game.
So you're a defense attorney? That means you defend criminals and such, right?
What is that stick you're holding? If you're young enough to play with toys then you shouldn't be here.
D.Va... Oh, like diva. I get it.
So you pilot a giant robot? Just like Franky... I thought only boys were into that sort of stuff.
Where did that briefcase you were holding earlier go? I hope there wasn't anything valuable inside...
You ride a pegasus? Like that old man from Skypeia. I thought there was only one of those creatures.
You're not really broadcasting this game, right? I don't see you have a Den Den Mushi, so probably not...
Aren't you a little young to be a detective? You can still be good, but...
Why can't you take off your gloves? Are you hiding something?
Oh, so you are hiding something under those gloves. Like a bunch of extra cards, or...
You act like you're tough, but in my opinion you don't seem very strong...
You're very upbeat for someone who just lost a round. I also think it's better to be that way.
You keep talking in this weird way. Are you part of a cult or something?
I'm not sure what your deal is, but you really should relax a little.
I don't say this to anyone, but those big eyes of you are very captivating, Mae. Sort of like a cat's.
You study the weather, Mei? We should definitely have a conversation after the game. I'm sure we can learn a lot from each other.
Hey... you look way too innocent to want to play this game. You didn't walk in here by mistake, right? Or because you were forced?

case.state: Ummm... I gotta ask... Nobody forced you to come here, right? Do you know what this game is?

state.text: Heh, did you know that your hair forms the shape of a heart?

case.state: Heheheh... Your hair is heart-shaped. It's cute and funny.

state.text: Saki, right? Are you feeling okay? You don't have to play if you don't want to.
Hey, don't say that. I'm sure lots of guys would like to see you naked. Well, some of them are perverts, but you get what I say.
Saki, you don't have to put yourself down so much. I think you're very pretty. Sure, you could fix your hair a little, but that's it.
I feel there's something unique about you, Zizou. But I can't tell what...
Why that monochromatic look, Blake? Is that in fashion these days.
Something wrong?
Wait, how can you be a human but at the same time have cat ears? Are you perhaps a mix between a human and a mink? Is that even possible?
Are you feeling okay? You weren't drugged before coming here, were you?
Hey! Can't you just take it easy?
Have you learned nothing?!
I don't want to look. I know that'll only make it worse.
Your name really is Kim Possible? That can't be a coincidence.
Did you say you work as a babysitter? I have a feeling I'd be good at that.
Ruby is a beautiful name. It reminds me of... nice things.
That's an interesting accent you have. Where is it from?
(What kind of bounty hunter dresses like that?)
(Is she really a bounty hunter? She doesn't seem to have any weapons on her.)
(A prosecutor... Doesn't that mean she gets criminals convicted? I better be careful.)
Are you never gonna get rid of that thing you keep slapping around with? It's dangerous.
Finally a normal looking girl. Nice to meet you.
With that attire you must be from Wano, am I right?
A princess dressed in armor... Your country must be plagued by war.
Sorry, but I've seen enough crazy inventions for a lifetime thanks to Franky.
Hey, you look like you haven't been outside in a while. A little sun doesn't hurt, you know?
I don't know what this talking butterfly is doing here... Should we wait for it to leave before we continue?
I think butterflies are cute, but a Devil Fruit that allows you to transform into one doesn't sound very useful to me, Yuelia. What if you get swatted by accident?
What's the need to be so sarcastic? Typical villain.
I'm sorry, but I just don't see you fighting horrific creatures or whatever it is you said.
You must be a student from a fancy school. That uniform looks more like a ceremony dress.
I know you've lost most of your clothes already, but you should stop with that attitude.
You're very young for a model. I suppose they need young models too.
Is that you, okama? What did I tell you last time about copying my body? Especially for this kind of stuff!
I don't think a young girl should be talking about spiders so much. It's unladylike. And gross.
Do you live here, Mary? Oh, it's just that you dress the way I'd expect someone to dress when they're at home.
A schoolgirl from a wealthy family, huh? How rich are we talking about here? Do you live in a mansion?
...Oh sorry, I didn't mean to stare at your metal arm. For what it's worth, I'm sure some members of my crew would find that very cool.
I love your look, Shantae. Does everybody dress like that where you come from?
All this talk about "contracts" and "targets" doesn't exactly make me feel comfortable around you.
Nice to meet you, ~name~. You're not very talkative, huh?
Fairy Tail? I've never heard of it. I don't know what you guys deal with, but I know it's not magic. So what is it really?
Hey! How did you do that?!
So you're a lab assistant... Who do you work for again? It's not Dr. Vegapunk, is it?
I know you mentioned you're a robot earlier, but I don't buy it. I thought those Pacifistas look real, but you'd be on another level.

case.state: Finally someone here who understand the importance of money. But keep your hands off the prize, I saw it first.
Do you really make a lot of money as a shopkeeper? Not unless your prices are really high, I guess. Good thing I'm excellent at haggling, so that wouldn't work on me.
Sorry for overreacting earlier. I just have a fear of living statues... among other things.

state.text: PA-15? That kinda sounds like the name of those Pacifista things. PX... something. Then are you also a machine?
Are you finally getting rid of that gun? I feel like I'm in a hostage situation with you holding it all the time.
You're already a queen? You don't look any older than all the princesses I've met.
Are you really a swordswoman? No offense, but you look like you just came back from a study session at a library.
So where's your sword, Connie? Or swords, if you're like Zoro.
Why is that knife red...? Why is that knife red?!
That's a very unique uniform, but I like it. What kind of school do you go to, Bernie?

case.state: I'd understand wearing an extra piece of clothing so you can last longer, but a box? It's a little too much.
Isn't it about time you get rid of that box? This is getting ridiculous... Even more ridiculous.

state.text: Now that I've looked at it more, your outfit really reminds me of the one I wore in Alabasta, Shantae. Is that where you're from?

case.state: Shantae, aren't you worried that with you dancing, and with that long hair, you might hit someone with it if you make a fast move?

state.text: I'm only saying this because I like you, Shantae, but you could always count your earrings and your tiara as items if you want to last longer in the game.
What exactly are you? At least you're human... right?
If I remember correctly, the last time I saw you, Kuma made you disappear. Back then I thought he killed you.
Last time I saw you, Kuma made you disappear in front of me. I had no idea back then what happened.
In the end, did you abandon your former crew? Good riddance. What a group of freaks that was...
So I guess you left your crew, huh? Is that why you're alone now? Good for you. That band of freaks wasn't doing you any favors.
Oh, are you taking off your dress now...? Ummm... G-ghost girl...
So you're removing the dress already, ummm...? (Crap, what was her name...?)
I've been thinking... Why are you wearing those thigh highs with a garter belt? Aren't they elastic?
Hmmm, I didn't notice before, but I don't understand why you'd wear a garter belt if you have those thigh highs that are elastic.
What's wrong with you? Just take off your thigh highs! No need to be so stubborn.
Just remove your thigh highs, then. Nobody will say anything.
Seriously, just take off your thigh highs. At least you can get more time.
You'd really rather people here see you naked than go back on your word? I weirdly find that inspiring.
So your ghosts only work on people as long as they're not already negative, right? Heheh...
I've heard that ability of yours doesn't work if you use it on someone who's already negative... Am I wrong?
You couldn't look any more different from the last Neptune I met. Maybe if you had a beard, hahaha...

case.state: Hey, you're the second Neptune I've met! But you look nothing like him. Probably because you don't have a beard.
You seem quite mature for a schoolgirl. They really develop younger every time, don't they?
Are you really in school? You're not just wearing the uniform? Huh, I seem to remember schoolgirls looking smaller.
You're part of the Literature Club? That must be nice, having people to talk about books with... Well, I have Robin, but two people is not a club.
You're in your school's Literature Club, huh? Man, I'm jealous... I'd love to be able to discuss books with other people. Aside from Robin, of course.

state.text: You're very upbeat for someone who just lost a round. I also think it's better to be that way.

case.state: It's nice to meet a woman with a sense of humor. At least your jokes are better than Brook's stupid "skull jokes".
That's a nice looking armor, but wouldn't you rather wear something that would offer more protection? Like on your head, your arms, your midriff...
Hmmm, why would you wear armor that leaves so much skin exposed? I still like how it looks, but I'm not sure it's worth it...
Didn't I see you appear out of a door in mid-air earlier? That's an interesting Devil Fruit ability.
How did you appear out of mid-air earlier? I don't think I've ever seen a Devil Fruit ability like that.
Did your friend convince you to come here? That's not very nice... This isn't a good place for a meeting.
Did you come here because your friend told you to meet her here? Why would she do that?
What's the range on your teleporting ability? Can you appear anywhere, or is there a range limit?
So... how far can you teleport with that ability of yours? Is there a limit to how far you can travel, or is it anywhere you want?
Not sure what kind of emotion you expect to find in this game, other than utter humiliation and embarrassment...
What sort of feeling are you looking for by playing this game? Humiliation? Embarrassment? Some people are into that, I guess.

state.text: So have you really been staying with Dracule Mihawk for two years? Living with a Warlord of the sea?
Have you really been living with Dracule Mihawk these last two years? With one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea?
Seriously? You didn't know? Well, I guess if you want to back down now is the time.
So you like fries, huh? I can... see that.
From what I see, you like fries a lot.
What's your training routine, Connie? You don't seem that buffed.
What a weird creature... Good thing Luffy isn't here, or he would ask her to join the crew.
What is that? The sea really is a vast place...
A fighter, huh? I'm sure you're no match for Luffy.
So you're a fighter. It's a good thing my crew mates are not here, or some of them would be eager to get into a fight with her for no reason.
You're a princess? You wouldn't happen to know Vivi, right? She's the princess of the Kingdom of Alabasta. I haven't talked to her in a while.
You're a princess, right? I've met a few, I know what they look like.
Oh, a princess! I bet your kingdom is rich and powerful. Those clothes you're wearing look expensive...
You... look a little young to be here. If you're as young as you look, you should leave now.
Doesn't that uniform mean you're still in school? Then what do you think you're doing here?
And people say that I dress inappropriately. That's still a cute outfit, though...
I don't see anything indecent about that outfit, but I also don't consider my own look inappropriate and people are always bugging me about me. What do you think, ~player~?
Nice hair, ~name~. Heheh...
I really like your hair, ~name~. I don't know why.

case.state: Very well. I'm on the right track here.
How many more times do I have to win to get the money?
You won't pose a challenge if you don't focus, ~name~.
Great! Another round won.
I'm doing great! Aren't I?
That seemed to work for me.
Sorry, ~name~. But you got in my way.
Look at me go! I'll have that prize in no time!
Winning in this game will never get old.
Oh, yeah! I'm unstoppable.
Hey, don't feel bad. Maybe you won't lose the next round.
Looks like I won this time.
Yes! Let's keep on winning!
Can we bet on what ~name~ is going to remove? It would be another chance to earn some money.
Aren't I great at this game? Seems that way!
Good job, everyone! Well, except for ~name~.
I can already feel that exciting treasure nearby... I mean, prize.
I'm much more than meets the eye.
I made it! Another one is in the bag.
Hehehe! I love winning!
Mmmm! I love it when things go right for me.
I told you, I'm not messing around anymore.
It's unfortunate, but there's things in this world you can't do anything about but comply.
Good, now I can relax. If only for a second...
Yay! Winning is the best feeling!
Heheheh, big catch, big catch!
Sorry, but I can't afford to play around anymore.
I knew ~name~ was gonna lose. How? I don't know... Woman's intuition?
Sweet victory, here I come.
Even if I'm half naked, I'm not gonna give up... Especially because I'm half naked!
This victory is mine! Any complaints?
Everything's okay for now! Now I just need to keep winning.
Sorry, but I'm not gonna lose just yet.
Sucks to be you.
Yes! I'm down, but I'm not defeated yet!
Hey, remember I had to take off everything. Now it's your turn.
No complaining, young lady. We all have to suffer in this game.
Someone has to lose, ~name~. You should know the game at this point.
Oh, right! You're still playing the game. But for how much longer? I wonder...
Loser! I guess I'm a bigger loser since I lost way earlier. But still, hahah!
My favorite part of losing the game, is making fun of the ones that are still playing.
Oh, man! The game is still going strong after I lost.

state.text: Seriously? A tie? I didn't know that was a thing in this game. Well, no harm done.
A tie, huh? Does that mean there are two losers in this round? Oh, no one loses! That makes more sense.
A puzzle, huh? If I solve it, can I keep whatever is inside?
Huh?
(How is he doing this?)
Yep, exactly like Franky.
Hmmm, now that I look at them, those wings are much bigger than the ones the Skypieans had. Are you from a different sky island?
That sash looks valuable! Mmmm, I miss that beautiful sky gold...
You sure have a lot of weird artifacts. I have a friend who'd probably like to examine them.
I was wondering what that weird device is. Well, it doesn't matter if you're taking it off.
Warmblood? Oh, you're probably different from the Minks that live at Zou, so you have a different name for your race.
For a tough looking guy you sure wear a lot of accessories. What's up with that?
I somehow doubt that's actually gold. But I would still like to confirm it.
What's all this talk about booty? I sure not turning my back with you here.
Is that your weapon?
DAMMIT, BROCK!

case.state: But then what's all that stuff for?
Hmmm, I was just going to ask about those keys... Of course, they must open something very important, right? And there's so many of them...
I noticed those keys right away... May I ask what they open? Maybe a treasure chest... No, a lot of treasure chests?
Is that all? Are you sure?
I knew you were going to count your measly ~clothing~.
Alright. If that's how you wanna play, I'll rise up to the challenge.
Oh, so that's how it's gonna be, huh? Fine.
What? Hmph...
This is annoying. Almost as annoying as Luffy when he's hungry.
Oh, you're taking that off? So I guess you don't really care if it gets "lost"...
You're taking that off now? You're more unpredictable than the Grand Line...
Ugh, for once I was hoping you'd take off something else.
Still with the ~clothing~?! Grrr...
Could you sink any lower?!
You're pushing my temper to new limits...
Of course you're taking off your ~clothing~. Why are you like that?
Your ~clothing~... what a crappy move.
That's it? Is that seriously, it?!
Why are men so insensitive...?
Inconsiderate jerk!
I swear, men make an even bigger deal than women about showing a little skin.
Figures you're trying to grasp every small opportunity you have to show less skin.
I know I shouldn't care about the game anymore, but something about this really pisses me off!
This is just sad. I don't look cute when I cry, you know?

state.text: I think I understood like 50% of that... Okay, more like 20%.
Your belts disappeared. Is that an ability? But how...?
(Is he stopping time or something? No, that would be too farfetched and terrifying for a Devil Fruit ability.)
And I thought I'd have a chance to relax in this game without dealing with weird individuals.
Wow, a sky archipelago! I'd love to see it one day, but there's no way I'm going to the White Sea through the Knock Up Stream again.
Don't worry, I have no intention of stealing it. No matter how expensive it looks.
That card isn't from this game, dummy. I have a feeling you won't last long.
You have nice eyes. Why would you want to hide them?
What kind of sword is that? It emits light. Zoro would probably be freaking out if he saw it.
How can you be so careless with that thing? It's a mystery to me how you're still alive.

case.state: Well, as long as I haven't lost a round yet...
It's no big deal, I guess. But if things go south for me later, I'll remember this, ~name~,
Next time I lose, I'm taking off my bracelet. Let's see if you like that.
If I lose another round, I'll take off my bracelet. It's only fair, after all.
Maybe next time you'll remove something bigger and stop wasting our time. Wouldn't that be special?
You seem to be determined to extend this game as much as you can. What's your deal, ~name~?
Everyone seems to be conspiring to make this game as long as they can.
Good thing I'm used to dealing with weird individuals. I bet you're no different, ~name~.
Alright, I don't have to worry about what you take off. I'll just focus on defeating you enough times.
Okay, I guess I don't have to play fair if you won't. I'm a pirate after all, remember?
When I get my Clima-Tact back, I'm gonna summon a storm to follow you around.
Great, now I'm in a bad mood.
You know, if you were a little nicer to other people, they might treat you better too.
You won't earn any points with me by acting like a jerk.
That's it, ~name~! I'm going to kick your ass! In the game, I mean. Unless you provoke even more...
I hope your dream is becoming fish food, ~name~, because I'm gonna make it come true!
I'll kill you after the game!
